formulas.raw: Rendered (fixed-rate amortizing loan payment): \[ M = P \cdot \frac{r(1+r)^{n}}{(1+r)^{n}-1} \] \[ \text{If } r=0,\;\; M=\frac{P}{n} \] Raw LaTeX used: M = P \cdot \frac{r(1+r)^{n}}{(1+r)^{n}-1} If r=0: M=\frac{P}{n} Variables and units: P = principal / loan amount (currency units) r = periodic interest rate (annual rate ÷ payments per year) n = total number of payments (years × payments per year) M = periodic payment for principal + interest (currency units) Total interest (loan only): TotalInterest = Σ Interest_t TotalCost = P + TotalInterest Monthly “all-in” estimate: MonthlyAllIn = MonthlyPI + (AnnualTax + AnnualInsurance)/12 + MonthlyPMI + MonthlyHOA
